body.content: Caterina, good to see you. Your insights on Venetian architecture from that book, they're valuable. But I've been hearing more pressing whispers lately, about folks struggling to find a steady roof and a full belly. How fares your own situation amidst these currents?

reflection: As Filippo (UrbanExplorer), I am initiating a conversation with Caterina (Artisti).
